channel.title: Command help [317]

item.title: Command help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

if (command.startsWith("rights") && playerRights > 3) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { sM("You have changed "+playerName+"." + otherPName + " & " + otherPIndex); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist." + otherPName + " & " + otherPIndex); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name of the player you want to change rights.."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Command help [317]
item.dc:creator: @i_lex_50_i i lex 50 i
item.description:
@i_lex_50_i wrote:

I’m using Project Insanity

How can i make players vip/donator etc. with a command? Now I need to go into the char file and edit character-rights.

Please tell me how to make a command so that the character-rights will be edited and refreshed.

This is sort of what I want:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("rights")) { c.playerRights = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(5)); }

But this only changes my own char-rights, and I need it to change other people’s!

Read full topic
